item.title: A very cynical guide on how to think like a Bangladeshi
item.description: Do not trust anyone or anything. Do not care about anything because of #1. Do not take any initiative unless your life is dependent on it, because of #2. Be comfortable with the status quo (no matter how painful is that), because of #3. Grow some kind of tolerance for treachery because of #4 I had a discussion today with my friend Nafiul, he came up with this couple of gems:

item.title: About
item.description: I am a self-taught Software Engineer living in London, one of the great world cities. I work at Amazon (opinions expressed in this blog are entirely my own).
